featured.text: Best I can figure is that I have some chemical, some mineral, in my body that draws lightning.

definition.zh_def: 礦物是自然界中形成的固體物質，具有特定的化學組成和晶體結構。
definition.en_def: A mineral is a naturally occurring solid substance with a specific chemical composition and crystal structure.
definition.example: Quartz is a common mineral found in many types of rocks.
